abstract class Animal {

class Dog extends Animal {
    Dog(String name) {

    }

    @Override
    void makeSound() {

}

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Animal a = new Dog("Buddy");
        a.eat();
        a.makeSound();
    }
}
